name: Dark Blue Lioness Shoulder Bag
description:
This large bag is made from 100% dark blue cotton twill on the outside and a beautiful floral contrasting cotton on the inside. The inside boasts two large pockets and one pen/pencil slot.

The outside is embellished with red, green and gold piping on the front and a large button with the same colors on the flap closure as an additional embellishment. Darts are added on the bottom of the bag for depth and interfacing for stability.

Approx measurement:

Across the top 12.5"
Across the bottom 18"
From top to bottom 14

Magnetic snap for secure closure

name: Calabash  Bag
description:
This bag is another of our original designs made from 100% cotton twill.   On the inside you will find contrasting cotton lining with two large slip pockets. 

On the outside you will find a flap closure  trimmed with gold piping and embellished with our signature red, green and gold button.  Under the flap you will also find a  large zippered pocket for quick access to your cell phone or anything else you need in a hurry.

Approx. measurements:
Top of bag 11.5"
Bottom of bag 15.5"
From top to bottom 11"
Depth 3.75"

Magnetic closure for your security.
Strap drop12"

name: Rasta Drummer Back Sack
description:
This large back sack will hold everything you need to take with you for that weekend hike.

Two inside pockets
Fully lined
Burlap, cotton
18"H, 16"W, 9.5"D
Handmade in the USA

name: Rasta Tote
description:
Another of our original designs - a tote to take to the market, library or school.

Made  from 100% natural cotton canvas with contrasting dark blue twill and our red, green and gold signature piping.  Inside is lined with natural colored cotton with blue dots.  Two large inside pockets to keep you organized.  Large comfortable single shoulder strap.

Approx. size:
13" at the top
15.5" from top to bottom
14.5 at the bottom
Single strap drop 13"
Button/Loop closure

name: Duffel Ras Weekender
description:
This efficient duffel bag is great for a quick weekend trip.

It is made from 100% cotton denim and is embellished with red, green, gold and black as a complement to the body of the bag.

On the outside are two pockets one zippered to secure your items and one open to maybe slip your airline or train ticket.  Adjustable strap with heavy duty brass hardware that can be worn on the shoulder or across the body and double straps that can be hand held or carried on the shoulder.

The inside is lined with  moss green and boasts four open inside pockets and one zippered for security.

Approximate measurements:
12" H, 27" W, 5"D
Heavy duty YKK zipper for closure.

Handmade in New Jersey
